message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $850000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $775000?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $825000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $785000?
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $800000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not sure if $800000 is the right price for me. Would you be willing to consider $780000?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $800000, Bob. I've already made significant concessions. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $780000 and $800000. I'll sell the product to you for $790000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not sure if $790000 is the right price for me. Would you be willing to consider $785000?
